descriptionHtml:
This mod simply makes Argonian starting Skill Bonuses more useful.

Instead of having +10 Lockpicking, they now have +10 Alchemy, since it makes more sense with the Lore and Lockpicking is generally useless skill to have such a big bonus to.

They now also have +5 to One Handed instead of +5 to pickpocket, just so they can perform better in combat.
Argonians can now also do Combat underwater.

Hope you like this mod, and if you do, don't forget to Endorse :)
author: AlienaterV2
